DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine whether provide ventilation delay umbilical cord clamp provide great placental transfusion improve hemodynamic transition birth .
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects receive 1 minute delay cord clamp arm . One arm receive routine care , warm dry stimulate 1 minute transfusion . The second arm receive routine care PLUS administration CPAP need positive pressure ventilation . The outcome determine whether addition ventilation provide large placental transfusion smoother transition birth .
DOC.criteria: Gestational Age : Women admit 23+0 31+6 week ( Reason : Highest risk IVH ) Gestational Age : Parents decline consent ( Reason : Can perform intervention time delivery ) Congenital anomaly newborn ( Reason : Exclude effect abnormal hematological function ) Placental abruption ( Reason : Exclude pregnancy risk hemorrhage time delivery ) Twin twin transfusion ( Reason : Exclude possible loss blood twin delay cord clamping ) Placenta Accreta Prolonged premature rupture membrane ( > 2 week ) prior 23 week gestation
